definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: Capable of strictly abiding by the stipulations on the printing of invoices and the production and management of special products for anti-fake invoices.
sentences.chinese: 能嚴格遵守發票印製和發票防僞專用品生產管理規定。

sentences.english: Capable of strictly abiding by the stipulations on the printing of invoices and the production and management of special products for anti-fake invoices.
sentences.chinese: 能嚴格遵守發票印製和發票防僞專用品生產管理規定。

sentences.english: I want to apply for carving a special invoice stamp.
sentences.chinese: 我要申請雕刻發票專用章。

sentences.english: Commercial Invoice in three originals manually signed indicating contract number.
sentences.chinese: 手籤的商業發票，三份原件，註明合同號。

sentences.english: I would like to attach the in voices for my phone bill this season.
sentences.chinese: 我想把這一季的電話賬單發票貼上去。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Units and individuals shall keep the invoices according to stipulations.
sentences.chinese: 三是用票單位和個人應當按規定保管發票。

sentences.english: Eligible people can purchase with invoices and apply for this room.
sentences.chinese: 符合條件的人可以帶着購房發票和房本申請辦理。

sentences.english: Low Value shipments including samples should have commercial invoice attached to the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 低值貨物包括樣品應該開具商業發票，並附在貨物上。

sentences.english: P. A. and the Risk of Breakage for 130% invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 保水債險和破碎險，金額爲130%的發票金額。

sentences.english: I can't write checks without money; that's against the law.
sentences.chinese: 沒有錢的話我不能開具發票，那樣做是違法的。

sentences.english: We send you here with our Proforma Invoice in quadruplicate for the purpose of applying for import licence.
sentences.chinese: 現寄你形式發票一式四份，供申請進口許可證之用。

sentences.english: Staple the invoice to the receipt.
sentences.chinese: 把發貨清單訂到發票上。

sentences.english: In this case, you should send that person another invoice.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，你要寄給那個人另寄一張發票。

sentences.english: The packing list should be indicated with shipping weight number and date of corresponding invoice.
sentences.chinese: 裝箱單上應註明發貨量及相應發票的編號和日期。

sentences.english: Don't send eInvoice to me. We will send eInvoice to you if the invoice wins a prize.
sentences.chinese: 電子發票不用寄給我，請代管，如中獎才寄給我。

sentences.english: In this case the proforma invoice is required for a third party.
sentences.chinese: 這裏述及的形式發票是爲第三者索取的。

definition: sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
